The written '''history of Dambrath''' went a thousand years back, spanning over a few different kingdoms.

The Arkaiun Kingdom.{{Yearlink|-946}}: The [[human]]s known as the [[Nar]], fleeing from the armies of the [[Nentyarch]], enter a [[portal]] in [[Ashanath]]. Their King [[Arkaius]] sacrifices himself and seals the portal behind their escape. The tribe settles in the [[Council Hills]] in the [[Shaar]] and rename themselves the [[Arkaiun]] after their martyred monarch
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[211 DR]]: The Arkaiun people fled southwest from the invading armies of [[Unther]] and [[Mulhorand]], through the plains north of the [[Gnollwatch Mountains]] and settle in the area north of the [[Bay of Dancing Dolphins]]
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[385 DR]]: The city of [[Hazuth]] is founded in eastern [[Dambrath]]
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[423 DR]]: The [[Wandering War]] begins between several Arkaiun tribes vying for territory
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[467 DR]]: The Giant [[wereape]] [[Dermos|Dermos the Proud]] develops a fanatical cult, claiming to be the gold [[Malar]]. He orders that all he Arkaiun people be killed
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[469 DR]]: Dermos, and all of his followers were slain during an ambush at [[Blackrock Ridge]]
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[545 DR]]: The Warchief [[Reinhar I|Reinhar]] unites the Arkaiun tribes into a single nation, the ''Kingdom of Dambrath'', and names himself ''King Reinhar I''
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[546 DR]]: Dambrath invades [[Luiren]] and enslaves the [[halfling]] population
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[553 DR]]: Dambrath invades [[Durpar]] and continues on to [[Halruaa]], seizing and holding several cities
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[554 DR]]: The Dambrath army is stopped when the [[Halruaan (ethnicity)|Halruaan]] [[wizard]] [[Mycontil]] kills King Reinhar I and himself in the city of [[Sulaziir]]. The king's son [[Reinhar II]] leads the army back to Dambrath in retreat
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[600 DR]]: [[Reinhar III]] and his sons are slain by [[hill giant]]s in the Gnollwatches. After some vying for the throne, Reinhar III's nephew is crowned as [[Reinhar IV|King Reinhar IV]]
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[617 DR]]: A mysterious sickness emerges in Dambrath and ends up killing one in 10 of the populace. Among the dead is King Reinhar IV.  Reinhar IV's son, who was 10 or 11 years old at the time, ascends to the throne as [[Reinhar V|King Reinhar V]]<ref name=tGHotR-p93>
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[647 DR]]: Reinhar V dies, his brother begins his reign of Dambrath as [[Reinhar VI]]
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[716 DR]]: Rich [[silver]] veins are found in the Gnollwatches. With this newly discovered wealth. The city of [[Herath]] grows three times its size in the span of a year
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[802 DR]]: Arkaiun silver miners dig too deep and unwittingly break through to the [[Underdark]] and discover the [[drow]] city of [[T'lindhet]]. The [[dark elves]] view this intrusion as a threat, slaughter the miners and begin to invade nearby towns and villages
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[803 DR]]: [[Reinhar IX|King Reinhar IX]] orders an expedition into the Gnollwatch mines and the Underdark, they are immediately turned back
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[808 DR]]: In the [[Battle of the Shadowed Vale]], just north of Herath, nearly 5000 Dambrathan soldiers are slain by the drow
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[817 DR]]: A large drown army is turned back by the army of Dambrath, fleeing into the [[Forest of Amtar]]. They are all slain by the [[Trunadar]] [[wild elves]]
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[819 DR]]: Herath is overwhelmed by the drow
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[822 DR]]: [[Prastuil]] is run over by the drow
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[830 DR]]: The drow begin their siege of Shantil, King Reinhar IX is trapped in the peninsula south of the city
The Arkaiun Kingdom.[[831 DR]]: The [[Crinti]] High Priestess of [[Loviatar]] [[Cathtyr Shintar]] betrays the Arkaiun and slays King Reinhar IX in the [[Battle of Crimar]]. She is made the new queen as the half-drow faithful of Loviatar take charge of the rule of Dambrath on the surface of behalf of the drow. Shantil is renamed to [[Cathyr]] after the new monarch

Reign of the Crinti.[[922 DR]]: Crinti raiders of Dambrath attack [[Ammathlauir]]. [[Luiren marchwarden]] keep the [[halfling]] population safe after a three-day battle.<ref>
Reign of the Crinti.[[973 DR]]: [[Crinti shadow marauder]]s ride through the north pass of Halruaa, beginning a series of battles that last for four years
Reign of the Crinti.[[1023 DR]]: [[Estagund]] raiders attempt to invade Dambrath from the port city of [[Darmesh]]. They are defeated near the city of Hethar
Reign of the Crinti.[[1035 DR]]: Cathtyr's daughter [[Filina Shintar|Filina]] slays the queen and assumes reign over Dambrath
Reign of the Crinti.[[1040 DR]]: [[Cathakay Shintar]], daughter of Filina, bribes her mother's lover to commit regicide and becomes queen
Reign of the Crinti.[[1094 DR]]: Queen Cathakay fights a [[gold dragon|gold wyrm]] in the [[Hills of the Dead Kings]], both are killed in in the battle and the queens niece [[Melanith]] is granted the crown of the nation
Reign of the Crinti.[[1174 DR]]: Dambrath naval forces raid the coastal cities of the [[Great Sea]], attacking the nations of Estagund, Durpar and [[Veldorn]]
Reign of the Crinti.[[1213 DR]]: The Dambrath navy lose several battles in a row; Queen Melanith pulls recalls the ships and begins national isolationism
Reign of the Crinti.[[1215 DR]]: Melanith dies of old age, her daughter [[Ausitil]] becomes the first queen of Dambrath to ascend from peaceful circumstances
Reign of the Crinti.[[1275 DR]]: Queen Ausitil dies in her sleep. Dambrath has no queen for 13 days while Ausitil's niece [[Yenandra Hazm'cri]] is away, and unreachable, at sea. When she returns, she slays two of her cousins who were contending for the throne and is crowned queen
Reign of the Crinti.[[1313 DR]]: The [[black dragon]] [[Valraxaxath]] rises from the [[Great Swamp of Rethild|Great Swamp]], terrorizes the surrounding area for four days and vanishes
Reign of the Crinti.[[1356 DR]]: Queen Yenandra, who is suffering in her old age, allows herself to be transformed into a [[spectral guard]] by her daughter [[Hasifir Hazm'cri|Hasifir]] and drow [[sorcerer]]s
Reign of the Crinti.[[1385 DR]]: Native Dambrathans rebel against the Crinti kingdom and reclaim the nation from their rule.<ref>
